name: quran-joureny
description: A modern, responsive website for an online Quran and Islamic studies learning platform. This project is designed to be a complete frontend solution for an online Islamic education service, featuring course listings, teacher profiles, testimonials, and a contact form.

scripts.build:css: postcss css/style.css -o css/style.min.css && postcss css/sections.css -o css/sections.min.css && postcss css/responsive.css -o css/responsive.min.css && postcss css/animations.css -o css/animations.min.css && postcss css/whatsapp-button.css -o css/whatsapp-button.min.css
